DOC.brief_summary: Comparative efficacy trial of INS365 Ophthalmic Solution and placebo in patients with dry eye.
DOC.brief_title: Study of INS365 Ophthalmic Solution in a Controlled Adverse Environment in Patients With Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: have NonSjogren's associated dry eye disease with symptoms lasting greater than 6 months had intermittent or regular artificial tear use within past 3 months had LASIK surgery had punctal occlusion or cauterization within last 3 months
